description: Number of nonzero elements in the character table of the symmetric group S_n.
comments: John McKay (email to _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 23 2013) observes that A061256 and A006908 coincide for a surprising number of terms, and asks for an explanation. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 19 2013
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
prog: (GAP) A006908 := n -> Sum(Irr(CharacterTable("Symmetric", n)), chi -> Number(chi, x->x<>0)); # _Eric M. Schmidt_, Jul 13 2012, revised Sep 05 2012
author: _Simon Plouffe_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Eric M. Schmidt_, Jul 13 2012
